mapper.sql: select identity, in_use, new_brand, old_brand, user_id, time, two_dep from dep_number_category
mapper.select: select a.org_code,a.two_dept_org from token_xkstaff_department a where a.user_id = #{user_id}
select nvl(max(a.user_level),' ') user_level from vd_outsource_leader a where a.user_id = #{user_id} and a.category = '2'

select a.*,b.name ,c.identity parent_id,c.name parent_name from dep_number_category a left join dep_equip_classify b on a.identity = b.identity left join dep_equip_category c on b.parent_identity = c.identity where a.identity = #{identity}
mapper.update: update dep_number_category set in_use = #{inUse} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select b.identity parent_id,b.name parent_name ,to_char(wm_concat(a.identity)) identity,to_char(wm_concat(a.name)) name from dep_equip_classify a left join dep_equip_category b on a.parent_identity = b.identity group by b.identity,b.name
select nvl(to_char(max(id)+1),' ') id from dep_number_category_his a where a.id like concat(concat('%', #{id}), '%')
mapper.update: update dep_opinion_feedback a set a.person_id = #{personId}, a.feedback = #{feedback}, a.feedback_time = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') where a.seq_no = #{seqNo}
